greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=-1; a(2)=-1; a(3)=-2; a(n) = 4*a(n-1) - 3*a(n-2) for n >= 4.
comment: Essentially the same as A124302: a(n) = -A124302(n-1).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,-3).
formula: From _Philippe Deléham_, Dec 05 2008 [corrected by _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 10 2012]: (Start)
G.f.: -1-x*G(0) where G(k) = 1 + 2*x/(1 - 2*x - x*(1-2*x)/(x + (1-2*x)*2/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 10 2012
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_, Oct 02 2006
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Oct 08 2006
